### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#14908](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/14908.html) (test: Removed implicit CTransaction constru
Agree that this improves the tests; ignoring return status is careless.\n\nutACK c84c2b8c92eb56b3b3793fc95265158f5eeb00db
BOOST_CHECK is not thread safe, but it should be fine in this case.
Oh well. I think the thread sanitizer yells at this. Mind fixing it up?
@MarcoFalke Sure! Fixed in #14969. Thanks for the ping :-)
